description:
The four schools advancing to the Vanguard Koshien semifinals have been decided, and they are Miyaji, Hitsue, Fukuhara, and Harumi. And the first match is Fukuhara VS Harumi. With their reputation on the line, which high school will proceed to the finals?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: スタンドアップ!! ヴァンガード甲子園!!
